definition: to smash
to knock against/to bump into/to run into/to meet by accident
variant of 毀|毁[hui3]/to destroy by fire/a blaze
to destroy/to damage/to ruin/to defame/to slander
variant of 毀|毁[hui3]/to defame/to slander

sentences.english: A man and a child were found in the Cave-in produce truck.
sentences.chinese: 一名男子和一名儿童在一辆撞毁的农用卡车上被发现。

sentences.english: Some said it had been driven to destruction on the coast of Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 有人说胜利号是在爱尔兰海岸边被撞毁的。

sentences.english: He"s likely to be bumped out of a job from a senior worker from the Millinocket mill."
sentences.chinese: 他可能被撞毁的工作由一名高级工人从米利诺基特厂。

sentences.english: Out of control, the plane slammed into the woods northeast of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 飞机在失去控制后撞毁在巴黎东北的森林中。

sentences.english: The cause of the aircraft crash is so far unknown.
sentences.chinese: 尚不知飞机撞毁的原因。

sentences.english: And at other times, Neptunes has you crashing into brick walls and running down dead ends.
sentences.chinese: 而在其他时间，海王星撞毁了你砖墙和运行了死角。

sentences.english: We are always interested in buying your SAAB Dead or Alive accident damaged etc.
sentences.chinese: 我们亦有兴趣收购任何绅宝汽车，不论好坏或撞毁。

sentences.english: The wrecked car had to be lifted before the driver could be extricated.
sentences.chinese: 必须把那辆撞毁的车子移开后才能救出司机。

sentences.english: Planes and helicopters and cars and birds crash into it.
sentences.chinese: 飞机，直升机，汽车和鸟类撞毁在这里。

sentences.english: The aircraft was smashed and they stepped out onto the open desert.
sentences.chinese: 飞机撞毁，他们步出飞机，站在空旷的沙漠上。

sentences.english: Auto insurance wouldn't be necessary. You would use your diskette to recover from a crash.
sentences.chinese: 车保也省了，一只磁碟足以把撞毁的车复原。

definition: to destroy by smashing/smashed up
to blow up/to destroy with explosives
to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
to knock down/to knock over/to run over (sb)
to knock against/to bump into/to run into/to meet by accident
to tailgate/to hit the car in front as a result of tailgating
to destroy/to smash
collision/crash/to crash together/to collide with/to bump into
to strike/to hit/to ram
pickup truck
to destroy in an explosion/to break (by bombing)
to attack and destroy
to collapse (of building)/to topple over
to bomb
to overturn/to overthrow/to capsize/to collapse
to damage/to devastate/to vandalize/damage/destruction
